text: (Va ʙa jod or ej Pajomʙar on zamonero, ki) Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon (onone ki musalmononro dar cangi Badr jori dodand) vahj kard: «Man ʙo sumojam. Sumo dilhoi mu'minonro ustuvor sozed. Man dar dilhoi kofiron ʙim xoham afkand. gardanhojasonro ʙizaned va tamomi pajvandhoi uzvi onhoro ʙizaned!»
